answers.answer: So he's got HBV, have you been vaccinated for HBV?

no....i do know now i also have it....but can't u see i know why I am in late seroconversion? I have read about Hep B and it's nothing so scary like what i had for 4months. And it sais nothing abut nodes.....so....i also have hiv...
No, HBV does not cause late seroconversion. I've had HBV and HAV at the same time. You don't have HIV.

I have read very-very few people even have one symptom….and it says absolutely nothing about nodes and sore throat and nodes or nausea…..and I do wish to think you are right, but you also think HCV doesn’t delay hiv and it does. I had only a 4months (18weeks) test.
Then take it to the proper forum. This is not an HIV concern.

teak.....have you read this? I am sure all symptoms were from hiv and not HBV but my test was wrong because of co infection.....i mean..come on.....migraine and fever and muscle pain and candida symptoms of HBV? never heared of it...
If you don't stop, you find yourself banned from the forum. You don't have HIV. MOVE ON.
you need a six month test. once again. good luck.
Get off the forum or you'll be removed again today.

Teak..i am so sorry for disturbing you again....please tell me if what jon said is true and I need to retest for HIV at 6months, because unfortunately I am very sacred to take it again.....I do not know what to do,......:(
You don't listen. Look for yourself to get banned from the forum.
you dont have hiv dont go off of bf test you need your own testing

I had Hep B in the past.I'm having candida, lactose intolerance and lymphnodes too and i'm also have the doubt that my body is not producing antibodies because this past infection.My doctor told me that he had a patient that wasn't producing antibodies to HIV due to a past siphilis.
It is one of the best expert of HIV in Australia.It's working on the sickness since the 80s.

I really don't understand if i'm HIV- as per my test, why i'm still having those symptoms?Candida is clearly a problem of immune system.I don't have diabetes, taken antibiotics...etc...And i'm sure it is candida because it is also  genital.

I had already a treatment but there were not results.Nystatin oral and cream.I know  you also had it. Does candida causing you also an anooying white sputum.Is maybe because my candida reached the lungs already?

I have read what you guys posted and it seems to me that I am getting even more scared. So he had hepB, but all bad symptoms he had were not due to that, says the doc, but an HIV with no antibodies produced due to syphilis in the past…..it is kinda hard to believe. I than have another Q: I don’t have/gad syphilis because I have a negative result, and I don’t have HepC, but B. can you tell if my symptoms were from hepB or delayed seroconversion (and that’s the reason I have a 4month negative result)??

question: Well…it took longer than I could take…but I found out why I am in late seroconversion : my boyfriend (last year one) has just been diagnosis “ HBS high reactive”….he doesn’t have Hep C although. Thank you all, I cannot say more, I feel very bad , I’m crying. Thank you Teak, Lizzie, Chris…all of you …bye
title: freaking out....moral support needed :((
